This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is priced at $950000. I believe this is a fair and advantageous offer considering its worth to you stands at $1200000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
